Read ME
info:
1. Change Edge Server to your raspberry pi's local ip address:1883
2. Power1~4 nodes : Read data of Indcution1~4 and sync with ui power switch.
3. reset1~4 : If Power1~4 turn off, then reset the ui text.
4. Timer, Type, Food : Read which recipes id was selected and set the ui text and power/timer of Board B. (If type of recipe is "yes" then it turns induction on. Else if type of ricpe is "off" then it turns induction off.)
6. Cancel1~4 : If user select Cancle Cooking on Board A, then check the induction number and turn that induction off.
7. switch node : Check which induction did user select and only send data to that specific induction.
8. SetTimer1~4 : If user select Change Timer on Board A, then check the inductuon number and change cooking timer to what user selected.
9. ingredients1~4 : Check selected recipe id and send the ingredients data which included in that recipe id's information.
